extendedInfo.description: There is no cost for the mobile app, but it requires a working trial, or paid subscription of the WorkTrack Service Management.  To log in use the same company name you use to log in on the web.  Contact support if you have questions.The features in this app include:* View Manage "Active Work Orders"* Process Work Orders* Process Service Agreement Work Orders (part of an optional module)* Add and View Time Card Records (part of an optional module)* View Work Order Details* Accept Signature on Work Order* Email Work Order* View and Edit Custom Fields* Configure Work Order Lists* Configure Work Order Details page* Error Reporting/Send Log* Receive Work Order Alerts* View and Add Text Notes* View Picture Notes* Attach Picture Notes from Device Albums* Attach Photos from the Device Camera* View Equipment Service History* View and Edit Equipment Attributes* Add Equipment to Site through Work Order* Change Equipment on Work Order* See Work Orders Where I am Secondary* Send GPS Location from the Field* Price Up Invoice from the Field* Email Invoice* Take payment in the field though (additional fees apply)* Email Receipt* View and Manage Received Alerts* Configure Mobile App through Settings* Create new work orders* Assign/Reassign work ordersThis application is NOT compatible with CorrigoNet or WorkTrack Facilities Management.

reviews.title: Great app, but could use more features.
reviews.comment: Love the app, when it works, however I do have issues with it not being able to connect to the corrigo servers. One suggestion to make it better for those of us that us exit in the field - in the notes section on work orders it would be nice to be able to have the option to sketch a note. I would be able to add to any job the location of the water shutoffs, attic access, crawlspace access, floor plans, location of water lines for irrigation, etc..... maybe you could even make it so pictures could be edited.
reviews.author: Rion Redinger

reviews.comment: Constantly closing. Have to uninstall and reinstall regularly to keep it working.
reviews.author: Libby Casaccia

reviews.title: Update PLEASE!!
reviews.comment: I gotta be able to create work orders!! Worthless app!!!!!!! Update soon or my boss will make me use a freakin blackberry!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kim
reviews.comment: Please, please, please update this to fully function like blackberry does. Techs can\'t create work orders which is interfering with the way we do business.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix problem logging in and no connection
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Corrigo
reviews.comment: Very difficult to navigate. Poor app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.comment: Improved from beta version. Creates work orders and invoices well. Would like to see time worked per work order somewhere on the details.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more.
reviews.comment: Can\'t create work orders from phone or lookup existing customers unless you don\'t have a work order already.  Needs full functions as on the blackberry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updated to BlackBerry capabilities!
reviews.comment: Finally this is the work track we were waiting for. Create work order capabilities and the ability to dispatch calls.
reviews.author: A Google User
